uk.ac.wlv.percs.lib

Class StreamHandlerWithBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • uk.ac.wlv.percs.lib.IOHandlerWithBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    class StreamHandlerWithBehaviour
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    This stream handler, should be fairly versatile, in terms of what kind of user input it can process. It can handle multiline requests, requests with multiple roots etc. However, it is recommended that XML requests are well-formed and conform to the XML syntax rules, it will return runtime errors if given incompatible input such as <<request/>> or <mess age/>. See XMLStreamReader for more information on different kind of custom exceptions.
